title: Little Men: Life at Plumfield with Jo's Boys
description: This is an alternate cover edition - ISBN 10: 0140367136 (ISBN13: 9780140367133)With two sons of her own, and twelve rescued orphan boys filling the informal school at Plumfield, Jo March -- now Jo Bhaer -- couldn't be happier. But despite the warm and affectionate help of the whole March family, boys have a habit of getting into scrapes, and there are plenty of troubles and adventures in store.
author: Louisa May Alcott
